text: Ezɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Kraisɨn itir puvatɨzitav, nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Kraisɨn itir tav ataghraghsɨ, a dera. A mar anetakigh. Arazir kam otoghtɨ, pam o amuir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Kraisɨn itim, datɨrɨghɨn poroghamir arazir kam aning ikɨrarɨghan kogham. Aning fɨriaghɨrɨ. Ia fo, God navir amɨrɨzimɨn ikiasa en dia.
